description: Gets a list of FAQs associated with an index.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If the response is truncated, Amazon Kendra returns this token that you can use in the subsequent request to retrieve the next set of FAQs.

nested_items.name: FaqSummaryItems
nested_items.description: Summary information about the FAQs for a specified index.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name that you assigned the FAQ when you created or updated the FAQ.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the FAQ. When the status is ACTIVE the FAQ is ready for use.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp when the FAQ was created.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp when the FAQ was last updated.

nested_items.name: FileFormat
nested_items.description: The file type used to create the FAQ.

nested_items.name: LanguageCode
nested_items.description: The code for a language. This shows a supported language for the FAQ document as part of the summary information for FAQs. English is supported by default. For more information on supported languages, including their codes, see Adding documents in languages other than English.
